name: Ebony & Ivory
description: A pair of semi-automatic pistols, designed to rapidly fire bullets instilled with demonic power. The right-handed white gun, Ivory, was custom built for rapid firing and fast draw times, while the left-handed black gun, Ebony, has been modified for long-distance targeting and comfort.
actionDescription: You pull out Ebony & Ivory and pop off a few rounds! POPPOP POP POPOPOP POPOP.
